title: Javascript
details: JavaScript is a versatile programming language primarily used for creating dynamic and interactive content on websites. It enables both client-side and server-side development, making it essential for modern web applications.

title: React Js
details: React.js is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces, particularly single-page applications, with a component-based architecture. It allows developers to create reusable UI components and manage state efficiently, resulting in highly interactive and performant web applications.

title: Node js
details: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine that enables server-side scripting and the creation of scalable network applications. It allows developers to use JavaScript for both client-side and server-side code, offering a non-blocking, event-driven architecture that is ideal for handling large volumes of I/O operations efficiently.

title: MongoDB
details: MongoDB is a NoSQL database that stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents, allowing for a dynamic schema and making it easy to work with unstructured or semi-structured data. It is known for its scalability, high performance, and ease of use, especially in applications requiring large volumes of data and rapid development

title: IELTS  for Beginners
details: IELTS is an international standardized test of English language proficiency for non-native English language speakers. It is used for immigration, university admissions, and employment purposes.

title: Web Design
details: Learn the fundamentals of web design, including layout, color theory, and typography.

title: Spoken  for Beginners
details: Spoken English courses focus on improving conversational English skills, including pronunciation, vocabulary, and fluency, to help learners communicate effectively in English-speaking environments.

title: Python
details: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its readability and versatility. It is widely used in web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence,
